DESCRIPTION: Whenever this creature attacks this turn, it takes damage equal to the amount of #yBleed it has.
When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead #yExhaust #b1 card for every missing [E] .
When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead pay #b5 HP for every missing [E] .
Creatures with #yErosion receive more damage from attacks. Reduced by #b1 at end of round.
Creatures with #yProtection receive less damage from attacks. Reduced by #b1 at end of round.
You may #yFreeze this card at any time by right clicking the icon.
